div.p: No. 3702, p. 1155, unit 43, VPRS 1187/P, outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office of Victoria.

MS is a circular sent to Heads of Departments within the Chief Secretary’s Department, the text being given on p. 1154 in the letter book and the list of recipients on p. 1155. Chief Secretary's Office

I have the honor to request that you will be so good as to furnish at your earliest convenience a statement showing all officers of your Department whose services have been retained notwithstanding that they had reached the age of sixty years.
